harbinger 1.0.56
  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

detect()
Detect events in time series
detect(<hanc_ml>)
Anomaly detector based on machine learning classification
detect(<hanr_arima>)
Detect anomalies in time series using ARIMA models
detect(<hanr_fbiad>)
Anomaly detector using Forward-Backward Inertia Anomaly Detection
detect(<hanr_garch>)
Performs anomaly event detection in the time series using the GARCH model
detect(<hanr_kmeans>)
Anomaly detector using kmeans
detect(<hanr_ml>)
Implements the detection method using a fitted regression model
detect(<harbinger>)
Generic detector
detect(<hcp_cf_arima>)
Change Finder Using ARIMA
detect(<hcp_cf_ets>)
Change Finder Using ETS
detect(<hcp_cf_lr>)
Change Finder using Linear Regression
detect(<hcp_garch>)
Change Finder using GARCH
detect(<hcp_scp>)
Seminal change Point Detector
detect(<hmo_sax>)
Motif discovery using SAX
detect(<hmu_pca>)
Multivariate anomaly detector using PCA
evaluate(<har_eval>)
Evaluates the model based on a confusion matrix
evaluate(<har_eval_soft>)
Evaluate the quality of an event detection model against a reference dataset
evaluate(<harbinger>)
Evaluate the performance of the event detection model against true events
fit(<hanc_ml>)
Fit Anomaly Detector Classifier using Machine Learning
fit(<hanr_kmeans>)
Fits a kmeans model for anomaly detector
fit(<hanr_ml>)
Fits a detection method using a regression model
fit(<harbinger>)
Fit a general detector
hanc_ml()
Anomaly detector based on machine learning classification
hanr_arima()
Anomaly detector using ARIMA
hanr_fbiad()
Anomaly detector using FBIAD
hanr_garch()
Anomaly detector using Garch
hanr_kmeans()
Anomaly detector using kmeans
hanr_ml()
Anomaly detector using machine learning regression
har_eval()
Harbinger
har_eval_soft()
Harbinger
har_examples
Synthetic data set for time series analysis Each time series has 101 observations with a single event on it.
har_examples_multi
Synthetic multivariate data set for time series analysis Each time series has 101 observations with a single event on it.
har_outliers()
Detect outliers in a dataset using the boxplot method
har_outliers_idx()
Detect and return the indices of outliers in a dataset using the boxplot method
har_plot()
Plot event detection on a time series
harbinger()
Harbinger
hcp_cf_arima()
Change Finder using ARIMA
hcp_cf_ets()
Change Finder using ETS
hcp_cf_lr()
Change Finder using linear regression
hcp_garch()
Change Finder using GARCH
hcp_scp()
Seminal change point
hmo_sax()
Motif discovery using SAX
